analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#198) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#295-332)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#410-432)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#503-518)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#526-540)
	- burn (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#749-759)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#603-610) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#343-362):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#358-359)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#360)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#634-649) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#648-649)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#571) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#613-615)

Reentrancy in SpectreToken.generateSpectreTokens (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#766-794):
	External calls:
	- generateTokens(spectreTeam,spectreTeamAlloc) (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#784-785)

	- generateTokens(optionPool,optionPoolAlloc) (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#786-787)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockedBalances (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#790-791)
	- lockedBalances (/unique_contracts/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf.sol#791-793)
